CdrDocCtl.DocTitle: Sort OrganizationName for Postal Address - Organization

CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr" exclude-result-prefixes = "cdr" version = "1.0">
<xsl:include href = "cdr:name:Module: Global Filter Templates"/>
<xsl:output method = "xml" omit-xml-declaration = "no" encoding = "UTF-8"/>
<xsl:template match = "*"> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:template>
<!-- Vendor Output Protocols ======================================================================= Re-arrange the order of the organization names if so requested. ======================================================================= --> <xsl:template match = "ContactDetail"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test = "OrganizationName [@OrderParentNameFirst = 'Yes']"> <ContactDetail> <xsl:apply-templates select = "OrganizationName"> <xsl:sort select = "position()" order = "descending"/> </xsl:apply-templates> <xsl:apply-templates select = "PostalAddress | Phone | TollFreePhone | Email | WebSite"/> </ContactDetail> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select = "."/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template>
<!-- QC Reports Organization ======================================================================= Re-arrange the order of the organization names if so requested. ======================================================================= --> <xsl:template match = "OrganizationLocation"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test = "OrganizationName [@OrderParentNameFirst = 'Yes']"> <OrganizationLocation> <xsl:for-each select = "@*"> <xsl:attribute name = "{name()}"> <xsl:value-of select = "."/> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:for-each>
<xsl:apply-templates select = "OrganizationName"> <xsl:sort select = "position()" order = "descending"/> </xsl:apply-templates>
<xsl:apply-templates select = "PostalAddress | Phone | TollFreePhone| Fax | WebSite | Email | CIPSContact"/> </OrganizationLocation> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select = "."/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match = "OrganizationName"> <OrganizationName> <xsl:value-of select = "."/> </OrganizationName> </xsl:template>
<!-- =================================================================== Template rule used to do XML to XML transformations which copies any attribute node, or node that is child of of something ==================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = "@* | node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
